SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager

Class AppContext

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.AppContext
public final class AppContext extends Object
Central service locator for application-wide dependency injection. Manages registration and retrieval of core services such as database connections, DAOs, repositories, and business services.

  • Method Details

    • initAll

      public static void initAll() throws SQLException, IOException, URISyntaxException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
      Initializes all core application services in the correct order. This includes database services, stock repository, watchlist services, and authentication service.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database initialization fails
      IOException - if stock data files cannot be read
      URISyntaxException - if resource URIs are malformed
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException - if CSV parsing fails

    • registerService

      public static <T> void registerService(Class<T> type, T instance)
      Registers a service instance under the specified interface or superclass. Ensures that no duplicate registrations occur.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the service
      Parameters:
      type - the service interface or superclass
      instance - the concrete implementation to register
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a service is already registered for the given type

    • getService

      public static <T> T getService(Class<T> type)
      Retrieves a previously registered service by its interface or superclass.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the service
      Parameters:
      type - the service interface or superclass
      Returns:
      the registered service implementation
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no service is registered for the given type

    • initStockRepository

      public static void initStockRepository(StockRepository repo)
      Registers a custom StockRepository instance for use by the application.
      Parameters:
      repo - the StockRepository to register

    • getStockRepository

      public static StockRepository getStockRepository()
      Retrieves the registered StockRepository instance.
      Returns:
      the StockRepository used by the application

    • getWatchlistDAO

      public static IWatchlistDAO getWatchlistDAO()
      Retrieves the registered IWatchlistDAO instance.
      Returns:
      the IWatchlistDAO implementation

    • getUserDAO

      public static IUserDAO getUserDAO()
      Retrieves the registered IUserDAO instance.
      Returns:
      the IUserDAO implementation
